page.title: 20CREDITS-UPPER RHYMNEY VALLEY
page.content: The compilation of this section was undertaken by the pupils and staff of Gwernllwyn Junior,Upper Rhymney and Lower Rhymney Schools,Mid Glamorgan. {TEXT: {PAGES 1-16,ROGER LEWIS,GWERNLLWYN { SCHOOL {PAGE 17,D.T.LEWIS,BRITISH RAIL,RHYMNEY {PAGE 18,TEXT R.LEWIS,TRANSLATION RUTH { EVANS,GWERNLLWYN SCHOOL {PAGE 19 NORMAN GILBERT,RHYMNEY. {AMENITIES COUNT: {MARION EVANS-UPPER RHYMNEY PRIMARY {MICHAEL SULLIVAN-LOWER RHYMNEY PRIMARY {ROGER LEWIS-GWERNLLWYN JUNIOR. {PHOTOGRAPHS:R.LEWIS,GWERNLLWYN SCHOOL. Finally,grateful thanks to the head- teachers,Mr.Michael Dunn,Gwernllwyn, Mr.Dewi Williams,Lower Rhymney and Mrs.Ann Jones,Upper Rhymney for their kind co-operation in this venture. {
